name: DunkelWald
description:
DunkelWald is a unfinished game that is not finished.

The gun is very bad sadly im working on that

Maybe also going to redo the playercontroller.

For now its going to be a Adventure FPS game in a Forest with Zombies(i have no idea how to add zombies ... yet.). 
Discord : https://discord.gg/dQnDzfqQtZ
If you got any cool ideas for the game let me know!

Controls :

Left Click = Shoot

F = Flashlight

E = Grab Objects

G = Throw Objects while Holding them

Space = Jump

C = Slide/Crouch

Alt+F4 = Quit
